import React, { useState } from "react" import { useDispatch } from "react-redux" import { newBlog } from "../reducers/blogReducer" import { setNotification } from "../reducers/notificationReducer" const BlogForm = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const addBlog = (event) => { event.preventDefault() const content = { title: event.target.title.value, author: event.target.author.value, url: event.target.url.value } event.target.title.value = "" event.target.author.value = "" event.target.url.value = "" dispatch(newBlog(content)) dispatch( setNotification(`a new blog ${content.title} by ${content.author} added`) ) } return (

Create new blog

url
) } export default BlogForm
